snippet.title: Room In Dream---Cozy Zen Game on Steam | Game Trailer | Game Play
snippet.description:
Hi, this is Cat Head Games! We’re so excited to launch Room In Dream into Early Access on August 30, 2023. 

Room In Dream is a relaxing, peaceful chill cozy Zen game with room building, Pomodoro Timer and Zen mode. Open Beta Playtest start on Steam now! 
Please check the steam page and get the free demo! store.steampowered.com/app/2443960/

Room In Dream is a chill cozy Zen game. You can immerse yourself in a Zen and peaceful corner to create your own cozy room. Discover, collect, and assemble a variety of furniture to decorate your little cozy room and surrounding environment, feeling the white noise of nature, time flow and weather change.

In addition to room decorating, Room In Dream has many other features, such as tomato clock, to-do list, pet raising, social interaction, ecological system, farm system, and many surprising little secrets and interactive props. Some of these have already in the game and some are being developed as planned. We hope that Room In Dream will give you more surprises in the future.

The game is still working in progress. Sub for more dev log and videos!
